title: Implications of Data Extraction and Processing of Electronic Health Records for Epidemiological Research: Observational Study
details: MHJ van Essen, R Twickler, YM Weesie, IG Arslan… - Journal of Medical Internet …, 2025
abstract: Background The use of routinely recorded electronic health record (EHR) data is increasingly common, especially in epidemiological research. However, data must be processed and prepared for secondary use, and decisions made during this …
